title: Subject Particle (이/가)
description: Marks the subject of the sentence, the one performing the action.

title: Topic Particle (은/는)
description: Marks the topic of the sentence, what the sentence is about.

title: Present Tense (아요/어요)
description: Used to conjugate verbs and adjectives in the present tense.

title: Past Tense (았/었)
description: Used to conjugate verbs and adjectives in the past tense.

title: Object Particle (을/를)
description: Marks the object of the verb in a sentence.

title: Polite Requests (주세요)
description: Used to politely ask for something or for someone to do something.

title: Future Tense (ㄹ/을 거예요)
description: Expresses a future plan or intention.

title: Quoting (다고/라고 하다)
description: Used to report what someone else has said.

title: Giving Reasons (아서/어서)
description: Connects two clauses to show a cause-and-effect relationship.

title: Expressing Desire (고 싶다)
description: Used to express the speaker's desire to do something.
